function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conversion of non-medical spaces into medical facilities during outbreaks","Impact":"Increased strain on medical resources, potential cross-contamination, and compromised patient care","Mitigation":"Develop specific protocols for safe conversion, increased training for staff, and implementation of infection control measures","Technologies":"Rapid construction technologies, prefabricated units, and modular medical facilities","People":"Hospital staff, patients, and general public","Owner":"Hospital management and local health authorities"},{"Description":"Overwhelmed medical facilities during outbreaks","Impact":"Inadequate treatment, increased mortality, and exhaustion of medical resources","Mitigation":"Establish emergency preparedness plans, increase medical resources, and enhance surge capacity","Technologies":"Telemedicine, AI-based scheduling, and predictive analytics","People":"Hospital staff, patients, and general public","Owner":"Local health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of outbreaks on urban functionality","Impact":"Disruption of normal city functioning, economic downturn, and social instability","Mitigation":"Develop contingency plans for essential services, promote remote work, and enhance community support systems","Technologies":"Smart city data analytics, IoT monitoring, and digital communication platforms","People":"City residents, businesses, and local government","Owner":"City government and urban planning authorities"}]}
